description: Slack has opened its platform for developers to build AI apps and agentic workflows using its conversational data. Powered by a real-time search API and an MCP-based server, it enables secure, context-aware integrations. Partners like Anthropic, Google, and Notion are already adopting it, with a wider rollout planned for 2026.
title: Slack Opens Platform for Developers to Build AI Apps and Agents on Its Data

description: Amazon's Great Indian Festival Sale has entered the “Diwali Special” segment in the country. The sale brings discounts on various microphones from top brands. Companies like CrossBeats, Digitek, and Ptron are selling new microphones with features like noise cancellation, Bluetooth connectivity at discounted rates. Here we've selected from of the best deals on microphones
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on Wireless Mics for Content Creators

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival sale, live since September 23, continues through the Diwali period, offering discounts on a wide range of products. Shoppers can find deals on furniture, home appliances, smartphones, laptops, and smartwatches, with top offers on large appliances like 5-star rated washing machines and robotic vacuums. The sale also features attractive deals on 5-star split ACs, with additional savings available through select bank cards, EMI plans, exchange offers, and coupons. Offers end October 12 at 11:59pm IST.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Top Discounts on 5-Star Split ACs During Amazon's Diwali Special Sale

description: Ahead of Battlefield 6's launch on October 10, EA has said the shooter does not include content made by generative AI, even though the technology is "very seducing". Battlefield 6 is developed by Dice, Ripple Effect, Motive, and Criterion. The game is available on PS5, PC, and Xbox Series S/X.
title: Battlefield 6 Does Not Include Content Made by Generative AI, Says EA

description: ByBit has become the first cryptocurrency exchange to secure a full Virtual Asset Platform Operator Licence from the UAE’s Securities and Commodities Authority. The approval follows its in-principle nod in February and allows ByBit to provide regulated trading, custody, and fiat conversion services across the UAE. The milestone comes months after ByBit resumed India operations and recovered from one of the largest crypto hacks earlier this year.
title: Bybit Gains UAE’s Virtual Asset Licence; Becomes First Crypto Firm to Get Full SCA Approval

description: Chainalysis reports that more than $75 billion (Rs. 6,65,000 crore) in cryptocurrency is linked to criminal activity, with $15 billion (roughly Rs. 1,33,000 crore) held directly by illicit actors and $60 billion (roughly Rs. 5,32,000 crore) in downstream wallets. Bitcoin dominates these holdings, while stablecoins and Ether are rising. The data highlights opportunities for law enforcement to seize and recover assets, and may shape national discussions on crypto reserves, particularly in the US and other countries exploring digital asset strategies.
title: Chainalysis Flags $75 Billion in Crypto Linked to Illicit Activity; Highlights Asset Recovery Potential

description: Razorpay, in partnership with OpenAI and NPCI, has announced agentic AI-powered UPI payments on ChatGPT. The pilot project will let users place and pay for grocery orders via chat using AI agents that connect to UPI and vendor systems. While the feature promises convenience, experts highlight privacy and data security concerns.
title: [Explained] How OpenAI, NPCI Tie-Up Will Soon Let You Make UPI Payments on ChatGPT

description: The Fujifilm X-E5 mirrorless digital camera was launched in India on Friday. It arrives as the first camera in the Fujifilm X Series to feature a five-axis in-body image stabilisation (IBIS) mechanism that offers up to 7.0 stops of stabilisation in the centre of the frame and 6.0 stops at the periphery. The Fujifilm X-E5 camera is equipped with a back-illuminated 40.2 megapixel X-Trans CMOS 5 HR sensor and is powered by the X-Processor 5 high-speed image processing engine.
title: Fujifilm X-E5 Mirrorless Digital Camera Launched in India With X-Trans CMOS 5 HR Sensor: Price, Features

description: Ghost of Yotei has reportedly sold through over 1.6 million copies, according to data from markets research firm Alinea Analytics. The game has reportedly become Sony's "strongest" PS5 first-party launch since Marvel's Spider-Man 2.
title: Ghost of Yotei Sony's 'Strongest' PS5 Launch Since Spider-Man 2, Sells 1.6 Million Copies: Report

description: An APK teardown of the Google Messages reportedly suggests that Google is developing a new Insights feature. The feature was said to be spotted on v20251006 beta. It could help users manage shared links from personal and group chats. It could appear at the bottom of every link preview on the Google Messages interface with a Gemini icon.
title: Google Messages Could Soon Introduce Gemini-Powered 'Insights' Feature for Shared Links: Report

description: Microsoft Azure has launched the NDv6 GB300 VM series, the first supercomputing-scale cluster of Nvidia GB300 NVL72 systems. Designed for OpenAI’s demanding AI workloads, it features 4,600 GPUs, high-speed NVLink/NVSwitch connectivity, and 37TB of memory per rack. The system supports agentic and multimodal AI workflows, enabling model training in weeks instead of months while optimising throughput and efficiency.
title: Microsoft Azure Unveils Nvidia GB300 NVL72 Cluster Built for OpenAI’s AI Workloads

description: Oppo Find X9 series confirmed to launch in India next month with the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC. They are claimed to be the first smartphone series to feature MediaTek’s latest flagship SoC. The brand will unveil the lineup in the Chinese market on October 16. They will come with up to 16GB of RAM and 1TB of onboard storage.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series With MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC Confirmed to Launch in India in November

description: Oppo Find X9 Ultra, the supposed Find X8 Ultra successor, is expected to launch later this year in China with a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip. A recent report highlighted that the handset could be unveiled with a quad-rear camera unit. Now, a reliable tipster has reportedly revealed other key details regarding the phone's camera configuration. It is said to carry a 200-megapixel primary camera, paired with three 50-megapixel sensors, on the back. Moreover, it could be equipped with a dual-telephoto sensor setup.
title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra Camera Specifications Leaked; Said to Feature 200-Megapixel Rear Camera With OIS

description: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Max might debut in India in early 2026, according to a report. The phone is expected to succeed the Reno 14 Pro, which debuted in India earlier this year. Its expected price range and key specifications have also been leaked online. The handset might run ColorOS 16, which is based on Android 16, out of the box. It is said to pack a 6,500mAh battery, and might be powered by last year's MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chipset.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Max Launch Timeline, Price in India Leaked; Could Feature a 200-Megapixel Camera

description: Red Magic 11 Pro series will debut in China on October 17, featuring the Red Magic 11 Pro and probably also the 11 Pro+ variant. Available in black and white, the phones retain the angular design and camera layout of the 10 Pro models. Pre-reservations are open via JD.com and the official website. The lineup will come with the Yufeng 4.0 cooling system with IPX8 waterproofing and a waterfall-style air duct.
title: Red Magic 11 Pro Series Launch Date Announced; Company Teases Hybrid Air and Water Cooling System

description: In an exclusive conversation with Gadgets360, Akshay Rao, General Manager, MX Business at Samsung India, revealed that the brand is hopeful that the new Galaxy M17 5G will provide a value-for-money proposition, segment-leading features, and more to the customers and will further solidify its position in the budget segments.
title: Samsung is Making Meaningful Innovations Accessible to Everyone: Akshay S Rao, Director, MX Business, Samsung India

description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new feature in its Android beta that lets users add their Facebook profile links to their WhatsApp info page. The link can be verified through the Accounts Centre or left unverified, and adding it is optional. Users can control who sees the link via privacy settings, sharing it with everyone, contacts, specific people, or keeping it private. First spotted in an earlier beta, the public rollout signals a wider release soon.
title: WhatsApp Now Lets Beta Testers Add a Link to Their Facebook Profile

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra camera specifications have been leaked by a tipster, months ahead of its expected debut. The company's latest Xiaomi 17 series, powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, was recently unveiled in China. However, it looks like the Chinese tech company might launch another handset as part of the series, which might be dubbed Xiaomi 17 Ultra. The camera specifications of the phone have surfaced online, revealing that it might offer a 200-megapixel quad-rear camera unit. The phone is expected to be powered by the same chipset as the other handsets in the lineup.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Camera Specifications Leaked; Could Feature 200-Megapixel Rear Camera

description: Motorola Edge 70 is confirmed to launch next month in select international markets. As we wait for the formal reveal, e-commerce website X-KOM has listed the phone, revealing its design, colour options and full specifications. It is listed with a 6.67-inch POLED display and a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 processor. The listing shows the phone with 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Specifications Surface on Retail Site Ahead of November 5 Launch

description: OpenAI is reportedly developing a new “clinician mode” for ChatGPT, which could enable AI-assisted medical or health-related discussions. Code references also hint at a “model speaks first” voice feature that allows ChatGPT to greet users proactively. While these capabilities sound promising, OpenAI hasn’t confirmed their release yet.
title: OpenAI Tipped to Be Working on a Clinician Mode and ‘Speak First’ Voice Feature for ChatGPT

description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 8 could be powered by an unreleased version of Qualcomm’s new Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, as per a report. Samsung is said to have stabilised the yield of the unreleased 2nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC through its Exynos 2600 test production. While production will be handled by TSMC, Samsung could play the role of a “sub-partner” and share limited volumes.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 8 to Launch With ‘Unreleased’ 2nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chip: Report

description: Vivo’s X300 and X300 Pro have appeared on the IMDA database, confirming 5G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and NFC support, ahead of launch in Singapore. Both phones will run on MediaTek Dimensity 9500, ship with Android 16-based OriginOS 6, and measure 7.95mm thick. The X300 series features advanced camera setups, including a 200-megapixel HPB sensor with f/1.7 aperture, an APO telephoto lens, improved Zeiss Natural Portrait mode, a gimbal-grade Sony LYT-828 sensor, Zeiss 2.35x telephoto zoom, and an optional teleconverter photography kit.
title: Vivo X300, X300 Pro Listed on IMDA Certification Site as Company Prepares for Global Launch

description: Vivo unveiled its new Android 16-based OriginOS 6 during the Vivo Developer Conference 2025 on Friday. The Chinese smartphone maker also launched the BlueOS 3 operating system (OS), too. The OriginOS 6 update will bring fresh themes, artificial intelligence (AI) tools, redesigned home page and app icons, along with a new home screen and clock widget. The upcoming Vivo X300 series and iQOO 15 will run the Android 16-based OS out of the box.
title: OriginOS 6 Launched Alongside BlueOS 3 at Vivo Developer Conference 2025: Features, Launch Timeline

description: OnePlus has announced the Open Beta Test for OxygenOS 16 in India for the OnePlus 13, OnePlus 12, and other models. It enables select users to try out the new Android 16-based update before it is publicly released. Before joining the OxygenOS 16 Open Beta Test, users are required to check the eligibility criteria and ensure that their OnePlus handset is on the latest eligible software version.
title: OnePlus Launches OxygenOS 16 Open Beta Program in India Ahead of October 16 Release: How to Apply

description: Bitcoin is trading just above $121,000 (roughly Rs. 1.07 crore) as the crypto market consolidates after testing new highs earlier this week. Ethereum remains steady at nearly $4,350 (roughly Rs. 3.86 lakh). Analysts view the pullback as a technical reset, with continued institutional inflows supporting long-term momentum.
title: Bitcoin Price Rises Above $121,000 as Crypto Market Sees Technical Reset

description: OnePlus 15 has been spotted on Indonesia's Infocomm Media Development Authority (IMDA) certification website. The listing suggests its model numbers and connectivity options. The OnePlus 15 is confirmed to debut in China later this month. It will ship with the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, ColorOS 16,  based on Android 16 and a 165Hz refresh rate display. The OnePlus 15 could pack a 7,300mAh battery.
title: OnePlus 15 Global Variant Bags IMDA Certification Ahead of Launch in China

description: Sony and AMD detailed their collaboration on machine-learning based graphical technologies in a video update on Thursday. The two companies talked about advancements achieved under Project Amethyst, which was announced last year. Sony's Mark Cerny also referenced Sony's next-generation console, the PlayStation 6.
title: Sony, AMD Discuss Graphics 'Breakthroughs' That Could Power the PS6

description: Samsung’s ‘Project Moohan’ headsets, which could be named Galaxy XR, were recently reported to launch on October 21. The South Korean tech giant is expected to host a special launch event for its first extended reality (XR) headset, where the specifications, features, and sale dates of the same could also be revealed. Now, the key specifications and several renders of the Galaxy XR headset have surfaced online, suggesting that it might feature an external battery pack and a rear headband.
title: Samsung Galaxy XR ‘Project Moohan’ Headset Leaked Renders Hint at Design, Key Features

description: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G was launched in India on Friday as the South Korean tech giant’s latest budget smartphone offering. The phone succeeds Galaxy M16 5G, which debuted earlier this year. The company said that the phone is IP54 rated for dust and splash resistance. It carries a 50-megapixel triple-rear camera unit, too. On the front, the new smartphone features a tear-drop cutout to house the selfie camera. It will go on sale via Amazon and the company’s online store, and will be available in two colourways.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G Launched in India With 50-Megapixel Camera, IP54 Rating: See Price, Specifications

description: Google has introduced Gemini Enterprise, a full-stack AI platform for businesses that integrates data from Workspace, Microsoft 365, Salesforce, and SAP. It enables companies to build custom AI agents using a no-code workbench for automated workflows. The system includes central governance and security tools to manage and audit AI agents across organisations.
title: Gemini at Work 2025: Google Introduces Gemini Enterprise to Bring Agentic AI Across Workflows

description: A patent filing of the Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold shows a three-panel design with individual batteries linked by ribbon cables. The camera panel houses the smallest battery, while the third panel holds the largest, potentially offering more total capacity than the Galaxy Z Fold 7’s 4,400mAh cell. Rumoured to feature a 9.96-inch unfolded display, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, a silicon-carbon battery, and a triple-camera with a 200-megapixel main sensor, the handset is expected to launch at the APEC summit, initially in South Korea and China.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Patent Hints at Presence of Three Batteries, Triple Outer Camera Setup

description: iQOO 15 was discovered on the Indonesian Telecom SDPPI website ahead of its launch. This reportedly confirms the handset's availability in Indonesia. It appeared with the certification number 1114907/DJID/2025. Meanwhile, iQOO, through its Weibo handle, teased the Legend Edition colourway of the iQOO 15. The handset is seen in a white shade with a matte middle-frame and body.
title: iQOO 15 Surfaces on Indonesian Certification Site as Company Teases Legend Colourway

description: Both Jio and Airtel provide several prepaid recharge plans under Rs. 700. Some of them come with short validity, making them suitable for temporary users. If you're trying to decide between Jio and Airtel prepaid plans, we've got you covered. In this article, we compare the top prepaid recharge options from both operators priced under Rs. 700.
title: Jio vs Airtel: Best Prepaid Recharge Plans Under Rs. 700 Compared

description: Intel has unveiled more details about its upcoming Panther Lake chip, officially called Intel Core Ultra series 3. Built using the 18A process at its Arizona facility, it will feature a multi-chiplet SoC design, RibbonFET transistors, and Foveros packaging. The processor promises 50% faster performance, improved efficiency, and 180 TOPS AI capability.
title: Intel Panther Lake Chipset Architecture Revealed, to Be First PC Platform Built on 18A Process

description: Netflix subscribers can now play games on their smart TVs. The streaming company allow users to play select games on their TVs using their phones as controllers. Along with the announcement, Netflix introduced a new lineup of games, all designed as party titles intended for group play. The latest move is a strategy to expand beyond movies and TV shows.
title: Netflix Makes Video Games Available to Play on TVs; Adds Pictionary: Game Night, and More

description: Meta has expanded its Reels translation feature on Instagram and Facebook to include Hindi and Portuguese, in addition to the existing English and Spanish support. The AI-powered tool replicates the creator’s voice and offers a lip-sync option for natural-looking translations. Dubbed Reels carry a “Translated with Meta AI” label, and users can choose to enable or disable translations or view the original video by adjusting the audio and language settings.
title: Instagram, Facebook Add Support for Meta AI-Powered Reels Translation in Hindi and Other Languages

description: Huawei MatePad 12 X (2025) was launched in Germany on Thursday. It arrives as the successor to the Huawei MatePad 12 X (2024) with several upgrades in tow. The tablet sports a 12-inch 2.8K PaperMatte display with a 144Hz refresh rate. The Huawei MatePad 12 X (2025) is claimed to have PCBA-level 3D dispensing for heat dissipation. In terms of connectivity, it ships with WiFi 7 and Bluetooth 5.2, and packs a 10,100mAh battery.
title: Huawei MatePad 12 X (2025) Launched With 144Hz PaperMatte Display, 256GB of Storage

description: YouTube will now let previously terminated creators request a new channel and build back their communities. The video-sharing platform offers a YouTube Partner Program, which allows users to publish their content on their channel and earn money from it. However, there are Community Guidelines that they need to adhere to, and their channel can get terminated if any violations are found. While there is currently no way to bring back a terminated channel, YouTube’s new pilot programme is said to offer a new lease of life to creators.
title: YouTube Launches Pilot Which Enables Terminated Creators to Request a New YouTube Channel

description: BSNL Bharat Fibre offers high-speed wired internet across India, including urban and rural areas, with plans valid for 12 months. Key options include Rural FTTH Voice Unlimited, FTTH Voice Unlimited, Fibre Rural Home Wi-Fi, Fibre Basic Neo, Fibre Basic OTT, Fibre Values Plus, and Super Star PremiumPlus, with prices ranging from Rs. 2,988 to Rs. 11,988. Speeds range from 25Mbps to 200Mbps, with unlimited data and calls, and some plans include free OTT subscriptions.
title: BSNL Bharat Fibre Plans 2025: Price and Benefits of Best Options With 1 Year Validity

description: From War 2. Mirai, Rambo, to some of the gripping thrillers like Search - The Naina Murder Case, there’s a lot to watch this weekend.
title: OTT Releases This Week (Oct 6th - Oct 12th): War 2, Mirai, Sthal, Rambo, Kurukshetra, Tribanadhari Barbarik, and More

description: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G, the successor to the company's Galaxy M16 5G, is scheduled to launch later today. The phone is confirmed to launch with a triple-rear camera setup. It will carry a 50-megapixel main camera, paired with a 5-megapixel ultrawide-angle lens and a 2-megapixel macro sensor. On the front, it is teased to feature a 13-megapixel selfie camera. The handset is expected to be powered by Samsung's Exynos chip, paired with a 5,000mAh battery and 25W wired fast charging support. The supposed pricing and other specifications of the handset have also been leaked in the past.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications, and More
